newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto EPS view adjusted.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto EPS view adjusted.

text.p: Dain Bosworth analyst Bonnie Wittenburg said she lowered her third-quarter earnings estimate for Monsanto Co to $0.29 a share from $0.30 previously and raised her fourth quarter estimate to $0.19 from $0.17.
-- Her estimate for full-year 1997 remains $1.70 a share, up from $1.49 a year ago.
-- In the year-ago third quarter Monsanto earned $0.28 a share and in the fourth quarter it earned $0.15 a share.
-- Earlier, Monsanto reported second quarter earnings of $0.66 a share before a $0.12 writeoff, in line with Street expectations and $0.01 below the Dain estimate of $0.67.
-- Wittenburg said her rating remains a buy.

-- "Although this stock is not inexpensive at current levels, in our opinion, earnings prospects continue to look positive, with potential upside surprises over the next 18 months," she said in a report.
